document_data.caption: An ornate dinner bell.
document_data.name: Dinner bell
document_data.mainbody: A '''dinner bell''' was a type of very small [[bell]], traditionally used to announce that the meal of dinner was being served.
document_data.Availability: * ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold both [[brass]] and [[silver]] dinner bells under its "Household Accoutrements" section, at prices of 1 [[electrum piece]] and 1 [[gold piece]] respectively. Advertised as being cast from the finest samples of either metal, these bells notably had bone handles that were carved in the shape of a [[swan]]'s head.
document_data.Notable Dinner Bells: * ''[[Dinner bell of Nethbarne]]'', an enchanted silver dinner bell that belonged to the [[thief]] [[Nethbarne]].<ref>{{Cite organized play/LC/The Other Side of the Coin|23}}
document_data.Notable Users: * [[Strahd von Zarovich]] kept a permanent [[unseen servant]] in [[Castle Ravenloft]] that was armed with a crystal dinner bell.<ref>
